attributes.action: Stop cuts to Grays fire station
attributes.additional_details: Essex county Fire and Rescue Service are planning to cut Grays Fire Station. They want to reduce the amount of Fire cover to one of the busiest and expanding parts Essex. Thurrock is home to over a third of the counties major risks, some of the busiest roads in the country and is under going the Thames Gateway regeneration plan, which is the largest in Europe. Help us preserve vital emergency services by signing this petition.
